Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; ENGRAVED; PAINTED
Name: Bowl
Description: Semispherical bowl with a wide mouth, a pointed, slightly inward turning rim and a stable base with convex bottom. Paste of a brownish-grey colour. Interior and exterior surfaces with reddish-coloured coating, partially lost. On the rim, inner and outer, it bears a decoration which is dark red in colour. On the exterior, near the rim, we find a double incised line encircling the piece.
